dct_title_s: Pascaerte Vande ZVYD-ZEE tussche California, en Ilhas de Ladrones
dct_description_sm: Dated 1666. Scale given in Dutch, Spanish, and English measurements. Issued in his: De Zee-Atlas ofte water-wereld, 1672, still showing 1666 date. Issued in his: L’Atlas de la mer, ou monde aquaticque, representant toutes les costes maritimes de l’Univers descouvertes & cogneues ... -- A Amsterdam : Chez Pieter Goos, au miroir de la Mer, 1673.
LC 473 & 474; Tooley/Australia 671(Plate 51), 672, 673, Koeman,IV,Goos1B(41); Nordenskiöld 1, 80 (40), Burden 378 (Plate 378), Clancy (Map 6.15).
by Pieter Goos op't Waater inde Vergulde Zeespiegel, Anno 1666

Oriented with the West at the top of the map, northern California is shown with indented coastline. "Straet Anian" and "Agubela de Cato" are to north. "Zeelandia Nova", "Anthoni van Diemens Landt", "Nova Guinea", "Compagnies Land" and "t'Land van Eso" are all shown with incomplete outlines. Title cartouche with cherubs using measurement tools (lower left).
